name: algorithmic-trading
description: The example strategy I will be implementing in this script is the Long-Short equity strategy. The idea behind this strategy is to rank a group of stocks from better performing to worse performing stocks, then to long the top stocks in the list and short the bottom ones. By doing this, the algorithm takes maximizes potential gains by longing what it predicts are going to be the better performing stocks, and shorting the predicted worse performing stocks.
author: cdara@hawk
